abstract.p: Tribute to novelist Joseph Heller, who died in December at age of 76, will be held at New York Society for Ethical Culture (S)

block.p: A tribute to the novelist Joseph Heller will be held tomorrow evening at 6:30 at the New York Society for Ethical Culture, 2 West 64th Street, Manhattan. Among the writers, relatives and others taking part will be Mike Nichols, Christopher Buckley, Bruce Jay Friedman, Michael Korda, Robert Gottlieb and Erica Heller van den Boogaard. Mr. Heller, the author of ''Catch-22,'' died in December at the age of 76. The tribute is open to the public.
